<!--- DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. IT IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED. -->


Computes the absolute value of a number.



```
abs(num: number) -> number
```

### Examples

```kcl
const myVar = abs(-4)
```

### Arguments

* `num`: `number` (REQUIRED)

### Returns

`number`
